alert.note: Alert for Ford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 2:52PM CDT until May 02 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN FORD COUNTY... At 251 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kingsdown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bucklin, Ford and Kingsdown. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
